detail_desc: ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Top in patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with pleats at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Top in patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with pleats at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Top in patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with pleats at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Jumpsuit in heavily draping jersey with a wrapover top, long sleeves, elasticated seam at the waist and long, straight legs.
Trainers in patterned twill with elastic at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Large paper straw hat with a partly sewn-in rolled-up section on the brim. Width of brim 21 cm.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. The socks are made partly from organic cotton.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a press-stud. Hard-worn details with patches on the inside, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a press-stud. Hard-worn details with patches on the inside, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Slip-on trainers with an elastic gore at the front. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton jersey with a jersey-lined hood with ears. Zip down the front, a front pocket with ear appliqués, and wide foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Rain jacket in woven fabric with a metallic finish and detachable, unlined hood. Fleece-lined stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap pockets and elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Short nursing dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, short flounced sleeves and a seam at the waist. Wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Short nursing dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, short flounced sleeves and a seam at the waist. Wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a small stand-up collar. Zip down the front, diagonal, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a small stand-up collar. Zip down the front, diagonal, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Lightly padded jacket in felted fabric with a zip down the front, faux fur collar with a tab and metal buckle, side pockets and faux fur cuffs. Lined.

Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature. Round neck, opening and button at the back of the neck and a frilled seam at the waist. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short, fitted dress in organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and short sleeves.
Short, fitted dress in organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and short sleeves.

Organic cotton jersey top with a wide neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Organic cotton jersey top with a wide neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.

Set with two long-sleeved bodysuits and two pairs of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuits with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Zip down the front and along one leg, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Satin sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastic and a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 9.5 cm.
Spotted elastic braces with metal fasteners.
Pre-tied tie in a patterned weave with an adjustable strap and fastener. Width 4.5 cm.
Fancy dress masks in plastic foam with two elastic straps at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with a kangaroo pocket and appliqués on the front, and press-studs at the shoulders. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck and adjustable halter neck. Cut-out sections at the sides and back and a fastening at the back.
Long nightshirt in a linen weave with notch lapels and a chest pocket. Buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Double straps at the hem, ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.

Fully lined, super push-up bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Extra crossover strap with an adjustable metal fastener at the back, ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and double straps at the sides.
Fully-lined, underwired bikini top in a push-up balconette style with moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trims at the back, side support and adjustable, removable shoulder straps.

Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves that taper to the cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a seam at the hem.
